Speaker: malik's voice
Dialogue: I'm gonna kill this dog!  You make my wife talk to me or I'm gonna shoot this fuckin' dog!

Speaker: leifitz
Dialogue: They're good to go, Talley.  Your word, and we're in the house.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: No one's going anywhere, L-T.  We can talk this guy down.

Speaker: malik's voice
Dialogue: Fuck you!

Speaker: leifitz
Dialogue: I don't think he wants to talk.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Where's the guy's wife?

Speaker: keith
Dialogue: She didn't take the kid to her sister's. The neighbors were wrong.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Goddamnit, you said we had her.  I told him we had her!

Speaker: keith
Dialogue: We got bad information, Talley.  I can't pull her out of my ass!

Speaker: malik
Dialogue: You said my wife was gonna talk to me, you lying fuck!  I'm gonna kill her dog, then shoot myself!  I mean it!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Pull the dog's name out of your ass.  Get the dog's name.

Speaker: leifitz
Dialogue: Talley!  You're in the line of fire!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I didn't lie to you, George.  You scared your wife pretty good last night.  We're having a hard time finding her.

Speaker: malik
Dialogue: She better talk to me!  I'm gonna kill her goddamned dog!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You and I have been talking for, what, sixteen hours?  Keep talking.  Is that your dog, too?

Speaker: malik's voice
Dialogue: I don't know whose dog it is.  She lied about everything else, so she probably lied about the dog.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I know you're hurting.  You lose your job, you find out your wife's fucking another guy . . . but don't give up. We'll have her talk to you.

Speaker: malik's voice
Dialogue: Then why won't she open her mouth?!  Why doesn't the bitch say something???

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: George?  Come back to the window.

Speaker: malik's voice
Dialogue: STOP LOOKING AT ME!!!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: George?  Leave the dog alone and come to the window.

Speaker: leifitz
Dialogue: The neighbors say he doesn't have a dog.

Speaker: malik's voice
Dialogue: OPEN YOUR GODDAMNED MOUTH OR I'M GONNA SHOOT THIS DOG!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Murray!!  They're in the house!  His wife's in the house!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: C'mon, Dennis, this is stupid.  I thought we were gonna go to the movies.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Mars?!  Whattaya think, dude?  Out here on the edge, no one around, it's perfect, right?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I'll check it out.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Try to act cool, okay?  He's gonna think you're a dick.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Robbing this place is gonna put you back in prison.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Not if they don't catch us, Kevin.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: We got jobs, man; we're working.  Why even take the chance?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Because if you don't take the chance, you're already dead.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: It's perfect.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: A pack of Marlboros for my friend and all your cash, you gook motherfucker!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: He's got a gun!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Mars, help me --

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Dennis!  Dennis, someone's coming!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: There's fuckin' blood all over you!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I didn't know he would have a gun!  It just went off!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Relax.  It's only blood.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: FUCK you, Mars!  I got it all over me!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: That woman's gonna call the cops.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Shut up, goddamnit!  Just calm down!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: What if he's dead?  What if you killed him?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: People are looking.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: That's why we gotta keep going.  I'm not gonna go in for murder.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: We're on foot.  We can't get away.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We're surrounded by houses, dumbass. Every house has a car in the garage. All we have to do is take one.

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: I have his corporate and personal on two disks, labeled Marlon and Al.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: My stomach is eating me!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Yeah, that's Thomas, the human piranha. I have to feed the animals while Pam's in Florida with her sister.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: My stomach has teeth!  It's eating my guts!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: All right, all right, all right--it's feeding time!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Jen!  Come feed your brother!  He's wasting away!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Can't we send him to Florida?

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Jen, c'mon, chop-chop!  I've got to finish my work!

Speaker: radio
Dialogue: Four, base.  You there, Mike?

Speaker: welch
Dialogue: Four.  I'm gonna hit the Krispy-Kreme. You want a dozen?

Speaker: radio
Dialogue: Armed robbery, Kim's Minimart on Flanders Road, shots fired with a man down.

Speaker: welch
Dialogue: Are you kidding me?

Speaker: radio
Dialogue: Ah, suspects are three white males driving a red pickup last seen eastbound on Flanders.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Tell Daddy that lunch is ready.  Thomas, don't be a turd.  Tell --!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I'm not going to hurt you.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: My father.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Get your ass in the chair!  Sit down!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Jen?  Are you all right?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: She'll be dead if you don't put your ass in that chair!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Who sent you?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Don't go Rambo and you'll tell'm about this on the back nine.  I'm gonna tie you up, then we're gonna take your car.

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: The car.  All you want is the car?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Am I talkin' raghead?!  I want your car! Gimme the goddamned keys!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: The keys are on the wall by the garage. Take it.  The tank's almost full.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Dennis!  The cops!

Speaker: welch
Dialogue: They had to go through the yard at 455 Castle Way.  I'm going to approach.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Open it!  You remember I'm right here!

Speaker: welch
Dialogue: Miss, I found an abandoned vehicle on the other side of your wall.  Did three young men run through the area?

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I didn't . . . see anyone.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: He's going for his gun!

Speaker: welch
Dialogue: Officer down.  Jesus, I've been shot.

Speaker: radio voice
Dialogue: Mike?  Mike, what did you say?!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: It's really hard, Jane.  This isn't the way I want it.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: No?  Then whose idea was it for you take a job in the middle of nowhere?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I need to work out some stuff.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: You're hiding, Jeffrey.  You're hiding from the job and you're hiding from me.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I still see that boy's eyes.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: That happened a year ago.  You've been gone for almost six months.  How long do you have to punish yourself for something that wasn't your fault?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Is Amanda there?

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: It's Dad.  He wants to speak with you.

Speaker: amanda
Dialogue: I'm gonna see him later.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: She has to go to the bathroom.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Can we talk some more when you get here?

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: We'll see you in a couple of hours.

Speaker: amanda
Dialogue: I don't wanna go up there.  I want to stay here with my friends.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: Pack your things.  You're going.

Speaker: louise
Dialogue: Mike's been shot!  Someone shot Junior Kim, too --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What are you talking about, shot?  What happened?

Speaker: louise
Dialogue: Three white males shot Junior.  Mike followed them to York Estates --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Where are they?

Speaker: louise
Dialogue: York Estates.  Four-five-five Castle Way. Anders and Jorgenson are on the way.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Sonofabitch.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: Welch is down!  They shot him!

Speaker: jorgenson
Dialogue: We think it's the three guys who robbed Kim's.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Are civilians inside?

Speaker: jorgenson
Dialogue: He said something about a girl --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Holster your guns!

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: I think he's dead!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Don't shout, Larry.  I'm three feet away.

Speaker: jorgenson
Dialogue: What are we going to do about Mike?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Keep your head down.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: How you doing, buddy?  You still alive?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: He's in the backseat!

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Junior Kim was DOA at the hospital.

Speaker: cop voices
Dialogue: What about Mike?  Is Welch alive?  What happened?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Mike's hanging in.  Larry, Jorgy?  Listen up.

Speaker: jorgenson's voice
Dialogue: Go, Chief.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Find out who lives at four-five-five.  We gotta know who's in there.

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Chief?  Mike said a young girl answered the door.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Did he say if she was shooting at him?

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: He didn't say.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Then we don't know if she's part of this or not.  Mickey, you up?

Speaker: mikkelson's voice
Dialogue: We're out two minutes, me and Dreyer.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Mike found a red pickup abandoned on Flanders.  You see it?

Speaker: mikkelson's voice
Dialogue: It's right in front of us.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Run a DMV on the plate for the owner's name.

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: I pulled Mickey and Dreyer off the minimart.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Jesus Christ, Louise, we can't leave a crime scene like that.  Put a unit out there.

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: We only have eight officers on duty, Chief.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: That's not enough.

Speaker: louise
Dialogue: What's that, Chief?  Say again.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Get everyone out here.  Then call the Sheriffs.  Tell them we have a possible hostage situation.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: We could've gone out the back!  You didn't have to shoot!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Stop it!  They found the truck, Kev! They're already behind us!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: We should give up.  All we're doing is making it worse.

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Quiet, Jen.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Shut up!  Shut the fuck up!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: None of you will get out of this.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Stay down!  Stay down, goddamnit!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: I'm going to my desk.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You're not goin' anywhere!  Get on the fuckin' floor!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Daddy, don't!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Take it easy, son.  I'm only going to my desk.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Get on the floor!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: I have contacts in Los Angeles.  Lawyers and judges who can help you.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I'll fuckin' kill you!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: This is every criminal lawyer in California.  If you give up now, right now, I'll buy you the best lawyer in the state.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We just killed a cop!  We killed a fat chinaman!  We'll get the death penalty!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: You won't die if you let me help.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Bullshit!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: But if you stay in this house, I can promise you this --

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Shut up!  Shut up and get on the floor!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: You can't imagine the fucking you're going to get.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Leave him alone!!

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: The house belongs to Walter and Pamela Smith.  They've got two kids, a girl about fifteen and a boy younger, Jennifer and Thomas.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: That would be the girl who opened the door.  Are the others inside?

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: The mother is in Florida visiting her sister.  The father works at home, so he's probably inside.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Louise?

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Go, Chief.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Get a phone number for the Smiths.

Speaker: mikkelson's voice
Dialogue: Chief, Mikkelson.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Go, Mickey.

Speaker: mikkelson's voice
Dialogue: The truck is registered to Dennis James Rooney, white male, twenty-two.  He has an Agua Dulce address.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Contact the landlord.  I want to know employment, friends, family, anything we can find out about this guy.

Speaker: campbell
Dialogue: What in hell is that?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: News hawks.  There'll be more.  They monitor our frequencies.

Speaker: metzger
Dialogue: How do we do that?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: That's my job, Metzger.  That's why I get the big bucks.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: He's not waking up.  He should be awake.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Shut up and sit down.  You think someone's gonna make a house call?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Make sure Kevin isn't fucking off back there.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I thought you wanted ice.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I'm getting a wash cloth for the ice.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Mars?  What are you doing?

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I don't drink beer.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Mommy won't know.  You can do anything you want right now.  Mommy won't know.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What I want is to help my father.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Hello?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: My name is Jeff Talley.  Is this Dennis Rooney?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You with the cops?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: The Bristo Police Department.  Look out the window.  You see the car?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Yeah.  I'm Rooney.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: We had an awful lot of shooting.  You need a doctor in there?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We're cool.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Let me speak to Mr. Smith.  I want to hear it from him.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Fuck you.  I'm running this shit.  You talk to me.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: How about your two friends?  You don't have a man dying in there, do you?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: They're fine.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: All three subjects are confirmed inside. Call off the house-to-house.  Okay, Dennis, I want to explain your situation --

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You don't have to explain shit!  That Chinaman pulled a gun.  We wrestled for it.  That Chinaman shot himself.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Mr. Kim didn't make it, Dennis.  He died.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: How about the cop?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Dennis?  I want you to release those people.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Fuck that.  They're the only thing stopping you from blowing us away.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: We're not coming in there by force, okay? No one wants to hurt you.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I got these people!  You try to come get me, I'll kill every fuckin' one of them!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: That fuckin' Chinaman is dead!  That's murder-one, dude.  That's the needle!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: I have to tell you something --

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We gotta find a way outta here is what we gotta do!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: It's about Mars --

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Bullshit.  Why would Mars do that?

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: I was there, Dennis!  I saw!  It's like he wanted to shoot that cop.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You're being stupid.  Check out the bathroom.  Maybe we can sneak out a window --

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Kev.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Jesus.  What is this?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Are you totally stupid?  What does it look like?

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: I can see you!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Dude, this is solid steel.  They gotta be hiding something.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Dennis --

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Go get Mars.

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: One in front is Dennis James Rooney.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Has Dennis done time?

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: Just pulled thirty days for misdemeanor burglary.  He shows car theft, shoplifting, and DUI.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Who's this?

Speaker: dreyer
Dialogue: We don't know.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Have still prints made from the tape. Show the landlord.  Maybe we can get a fast ID.

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: I can't make it out.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Says...burn it.

Speaker: dreyer
Dialogue: What's he doing?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: He's watching Kim die.

Speaker: metzger
Dialogue: Chief?

Speaker: amanda
Dialogue: Are men with guns really barricaded in a house?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Just around the corner and up that street.  See the helicopters?

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: Wait by the car, Mandy.  Give me a minute with Dad.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I should've called.  This thing broke right after we spoke, then everything happened so fast --

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: Don't worry about it.  How are you doing?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: The Sheriffs will take over when they get here.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: But they're not here yet.  Tell me about you.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Why don't you guys grab some dinner at the Thai place?  I'll meet you there as soon as I can.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: You sure?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I don't know how long I'll be stuck here.

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: I'm in no rush.  Maybe later we can talk.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Jane?

Speaker: jane
Dialogue: That's okay.  I love you anyway.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Hey, you guys know what's going on?

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: Three men took a family hostage.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Jesus, no shit?  My client lives in there.

Speaker: reporter
Dialogue: It's a family named Smith, Walter and Pamela Smith.  Do you know them?

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: No.  No, I don't know them.  Thanks for your time.

Speaker: tuzee
Dialogue: Worst case, it's a bloodbath.  The detectives come out with Smith's computer, and we go directly to jail, do not pass Go.

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: Maybe Glen already picked up the disks.

Speaker: tuzee
Dialogue: I took the call from Glen personally. They're still in Smith's house.

Speaker: fischer
Dialogue: Maybe we're getting too dramatic.  It's three kids.  They'll give up, the cops will arrest them, and that's that.  Why would they search the house?

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: You think we should take that chance?

Speaker: fischer
Dialogue: I guess not.

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: I guess not, too.  How much information is in the house?

Speaker: tuzee
Dialogue: Smith was cooking the books for the IRS. That means he has it all:  The cash flow, where it comes from, how we launder it, our split with the East.

Speaker: fischer
Dialogue: It's on two computer disks he calls Marlon and Al.

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: What, he's cute?  That's his idea of humor?

Speaker: fischer
Dialogue: If the Feds get those disks, the East Coast is gonna take a hit, too.  You should let them know.

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: No way.  I tell them, that Old Man is gonna handle this from back there.

Speaker: tuzee
Dialogue: You should warn them, Sonny.

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: Fuck them!  Now get your head in the game, Phil--we have to handle this.

Speaker: tuzee
Dialogue: He knows better than that.

Speaker: fischer
Dialogue: They have a chief of police, a guy named Talley.  I saw him being interviewed.

Speaker: fischer
Dialogue: Hey, that's him.  That's Talley right there!

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: Find out how we can hurt him.  By the end of the day, I want to own him.

Speaker: tuzee
Dialogue: It's happening right now.

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: L.A. County Sheriffs are inbound from a bank robbery in Pico Rivera.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Give me an ETA.

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: An hour, tops.  Might be sooner.

Speaker: manelli
Dialogue: When the Sheriffs get here, how many we looking at?

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: A command team, a negotiating team, a tactical team--the tac team includes a perimeter team, the assault team, snipers, and breachers--thirty-five new bodies.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: How many locals?

Speaker: devarona
Dialogue: Fourteen officers and two civilians.  I have their names and most of their addresses.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: And Talley?

Speaker: devarona
Dialogue: Married but separated, ex-LAPD.  The fam doesn't live here, but they're coming up today.  I got his address there.

Speaker: manelli
Dialogue: The cops I talked to, they said Talley was a hostage negotiator in LA.

Speaker: devarona
Dialogue: His last three years on the job.  Before that, he was SWAT.

Speaker: ruiz
Dialogue: How's a SWAT negotiator make it up here to this shithole?

Speaker: devarona
Dialogue: I make him for a stress release.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Good work, Gayle--everybody.  Now stay ahead of the curve.  I want to know everything that happens before it happens.  I'll cover Talley.

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: What if it goes south?

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: If things get wet, we're going to need someone who can handle that end.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: You worry about your end.  I got my side covered.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Talley lives here.  I don't know if the place has security or not.

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: It won't be a problem.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: He has a wife and kid.  That's how we'll get to him.

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: Okey-doke.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: We have to own this guy, Marion.  We don't want him dead; we need to use him.

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: Can we make him dead after we use him?

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Whatever you want.  Page me when you're done.

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: I don't eat junk food.

Speaker: metzger
Dialogue: PacBell shows six lines into the house. They blocked all six like you wanted.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I have the only number that can call into the house?

Speaker: metzger
Dialogue: Yes, sir.  They'll only accept calls from your cell.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Way to go.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: Chief, this is Brad Dill.  Dennis and Kevin work for him.

Speaker: dill
Dialogue: I didn't know anything about this.  I didn't know what they were gonna do.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Mr. Dill, these pricks didn't know what they were going to do until they did it. I want you to take a look at something.

Speaker: dill
Dialogue: That would be Mars Krupchek.  Jesus, he works for me, too.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Have Louise run the name 'Mars Krupchek' through DMV and NCIC.  Tell her to list the tattoo as an identifier.

Speaker: dill
Dialogue: Keeps to himself, more like.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You have his address?

Speaker: dill
Dialogue: Pretty sure I do.  Yeah, here we go --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Call the Palmdale City Attorney for a telephonic search warrant.  When you get the warrant, have Mikkelson and Dreyer search his house.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: metzger
Dialogue: Chief!  The Sheriffs are ten minutes out!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Louise?

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Go, Chief.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Call Jane for me.  She's at the little Thai place.

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: I know the one.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Tell her I'm almost home.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: There's gotta be a million bucks here. Maybe two million!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: It's a safety room.  If anyone breaks into your house, you can hide.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Who gives a shit, Mars?  Check out the cash!  We're rich.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: We're trapped in a house.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We can take it with us.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: You can't run with suitcases.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Then we'll stuff it up our asses.  This is the payoff.  This is every dream you ever had, all in those two bags.

Speaker: anchor
Dialogue: -- thought to be Dennis James Rooney. Rooney was recently released from the Antelope Valley Correctional Institute where he served time for robbery.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Check me out!  I look like fuckin' Jon Bon Jovi.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Everyone knows what we look like, Dennis. We won't be able to hide.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Jesus, first Mars, now you.  You two need anti-depressants.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: My father needs a doctor.  Please.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Hey, I've got a situation here, in case you haven't noticed.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: All you're doing is watching yourself on TV.  Look at him.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Use more ice.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I'm getting a doctor!

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Jen!!!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Stop it!  Stop it, Dennis!  Jesus!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: We should tie them.  We can put them upstairs out of the way.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: That's right.  That's a good idea, Mars.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Find something:  Extension cords, rope, wire--we'll have to tie them tight.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Find something, Kevin.  Don't just stand there.  And tie this bastard, too.  I don't want him waking up and goin' Rambo on us.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Tie her to the chair.  I'll take care of the windows when I finish with the boy.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Here.  Put this on.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I don't see why you can't just lock me in.  It's not like I can go anywhere.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Either I'm going to tie you or Mars will tie you.  Which do you want?

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Thanks for the shirt.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Whatever.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Kevin, my father needs a doctor.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: He's just knocked out.  I've been knocked out.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: If my father dies they'll charge you with his murder.  Can't you make Dennis see that?

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: I can't make Dennis see anything.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Look what I found.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Make sure she can breathe.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Go downstairs, Kevin.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Jen!

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Sit still!  If they're in the security room, they can see you on the monitors.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Ow!  Shit!

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Be quiet!  Listen!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: No one's coming.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Mine, too.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: We can use the crawlspace to get downstairs.  Then we can run for it.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: No!  I'm not going to leave Daddy with them!

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: We can't carry him.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: You go, Thomas.  You get out, and I'll stay with Daddy.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I'm not gonna leave you!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Go!  If you get out, maybe you can help the police!

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: We'll all go, Jennifer.  All of us or none of us.  I know where Daddy keeps a gun.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: You leave that gun alone!

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Shh, they'll hear you!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Better than you getting killed!  Don't touch that gun!  Daddy says --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm Talley.  Who's in charge?

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Laura Martin.  This is Will Maddox, the primary negotiator --

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: Is the perimeter around the house secure?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I've got fourteen officers on my department including me.  We're as secure as we can be.

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: Permission to deploy the line?

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Do it.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Don't crowd the house.  The alpha's a kid named Rooney.  He's amped up and volatile.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Sounds like you know the job.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I've done it once or twice.  I blocked their phones to incoming calls, so you'll have to cut in a hard line to talk to him.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Maddox!  You got that?

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: Doing it now!

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: I'd like you to brief my supervisors before we take over the scene.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Whatever you want.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Someone should stay with Mr. Smith.  What if he wakes up?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: That's why we tied him, dumbass.  Now come here and see this --

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: That's crazy, Dennis.  The cops will see us.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Not if they're looking at something else.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Like what?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Let's burn the house.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: We can't carry all this.  It's too heavy.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I've been carrying you our whole fuckin' lives.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Everything we're doing is making it worse.  You can't let him burn this house.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Nothing's worse than listening to you. I'm warning you, Kevin--stop holding me back.  Now you pick up that fuckin' money and get ready to go.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: They're coming!  Kev, Mars, they're coming!!!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: The cops are comin'!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I got the gasoline --

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We don't have time!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Who's that shooting?  Martin, what's going on?

Speaker: radio voices
Dialogue: Shots fired!  We are taking fire on the back wall!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: They're too close!  I told you not to crowd him!  Pull back your people; do not breach that house!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: This thing good?

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: What in hell are you doing?  He's shooting at my men!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You breach that house, we're gonna have a bloodbath!  I know this guy, Captain -- I can talk to him.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Order your men to stand down.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Look out the window, Dennis.  We are NOT entering the house.  We're pulling back.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You fuck!  I got a fuckin' gun to this kid's head!  I'll kill'm, you fuck!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: It's over now, Dennis!  Don't hurt anyone.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We'll burn this fuckin' place down!  I got gasoline all over in here!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: No one's coming in.  A couple of guys out here got carried away.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Goddamned right they got carried away. It looks like an army out there.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: It's over.  He's cooling off.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Talley?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm here.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I want a helicopter to take us to Mexico.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: That's not going to happen, Dennis.  They won't give you a helicopter.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I'll give you these people.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: The Mexican police would arrest you as soon as it landed.  There's only one way out and you're doing it right now--just keep talking to us.  I think we could make the transition now. Maddox, you good to go?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I gotta piss real bad.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You're a funny guy, Talley.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm going to put on an officer named Will Maddox.  You talk to him for a while.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Jesus.  He must've siphoned it from the cars.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: If you go in, you can't use tear gas or flashbangs.  The whole place would go up.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Looks like you're bailing out at the right time.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: That's why you get the big bucks, Captain.

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Chief, base.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Go.

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: I couldn't find Jane.  She wasn't at the restaurant.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You have her cell number?

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: She didn't answer.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: They might be at the house.  Keep trying and let me know.  I'm going to be here a little while longer.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: We're surrounded.  They're all over the neighborhood.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: What the fuck is that?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: They'll cut the power.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What about my father?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Aw, Jesus, not more of this.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Look at him!  I think he's dying!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Take'm back upstairs, but don't tie'm like before.  That little fuck untied himself anyway.

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Chief, base.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Did you find Jane and Mandy?

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Could you call me back on your phone? Right away.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What's wrong with the radio?

Speaker: louise's voice
Dialogue: Other people can hear us.  Just call. Please.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Stand by.

Speaker: louise
Dialogue: We have a boy on the line.  He says he's Thomas Smith and he's calling from the house.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: It's a crank, Louise.  C'mon, don't waste my time with that!

Speaker: louise
Dialogue: His cell number belongs to the Smiths.  I think it's real, Chief.  I think this boy is inside that house.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Put him on.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Get Martin.  Right away.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Slow down, Thomas.  Take it easy and talk to me.  Was your father shot?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Dennis hit him.  His head's all big and he won't wake up.  I'm really scared.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: How about you and your sister?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: We're okay.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Where are you right now?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: In my room.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: That's on the second floor.  Could you climb out your window if we were downstairs to catch you?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: They nailed the windows.  I can't get'm open.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What was that, son?  I didn't hear you.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: If I try to climb out they'll see me on the security cameras.  They would see you outside, too --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Thomas?  Thomas...?

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: If we have a man dying in there, we'll have to go in.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: They have security cameras.  Rooney would see you coming.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Did the boy say that any of them are in immediate danger?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: No.  He said that his father's unconscious; he didn't say he was dying.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Then I think we should wait.  Do you agree?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You want me to stick around, I could --

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: You've been here all day, Chief.  Take a break.  See your family.  If I need you, I'll call.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Jane?  If you're there, pick up, okay? Mandy?

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: He's leaving now.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: Do you see the fuckin' gun?!  Look at it!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Take it easy.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: Where's your gun?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm the Chief.  I don't carry it.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: Follow the Mustang.  We won't go far.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: I know you're scared, but unless you do something stupid we're not going to hurt you.  You understand?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What do you want?

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: These guys are going to take hold of you. Don't freak out.  It's for your own good.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What is this?

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: Say hello.

Speaker: jane's voice
Dialogue: Jeff?  Is that you?

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: I know, I know--she's all right.  Your kid's all right, too.  C'mon, now, relax. From this point on, you control what happens to them.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You can let go.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: Here's the deal--Walter Smith has two computer disks like this in his house. They're labeled 'Marlon' and 'Al.'

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Marlon and Al....

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: We want them.  You will not let anyone go into that house--or anything come out-- until my people recover these disks.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I can't control what happens.  The Sheriffs are running the scene.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: You will re-assume command.  In two hours, a group of my people will arrive at York Estates.  You will tell the Sheriffs that they are an FBI tactical team.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You want . . . Marlon and Al.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: I have people in York Estates right under your nose.  If you do anything except what I'm telling you, you'll get Jane and Amanda back in the mail.  We clear on that?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: These disks . . . where are they?

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: Smith will know.

Speaker: the watchman
Dialogue: When it rings, answer.

Speaker: louise
Dialogue: You look terrible.  Chief, are you all right?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm going back to York.  Have Larry meet me at the front gate.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: What's up, Chief?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I want you to run this license plate and phone number.  Then I want you to find out everything you can about Walter Smith. ANDERS The guy in the house?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Go back to the office.  Run his name through the FBI and the NLETS database. I think he's involved with illegal activity or he associates with people who are.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: Wow.  Sure, right away, Chief.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Don't tell anyone what you're doing, not Louise, not the other guys, not the Sheriffs.  You understand me, Larry?

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: I guess so.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Fuck guessing.  You keep your mouth shut.

Speaker: anders
Dialogue: I will, Chief.  Absolutely.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Get to work.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm re-assuming command of the scene.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Excuse me?  You requested our help.  You turned over command --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: And now I'm taking it back.  We're getting Smith out of the house.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Thomas?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: We can't make the microwave work.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: We're hungry.  You're going to cook.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Make the pizza.  I want scrambled eggs and hot dogs on mine.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: How about dog shit?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: With hot sauce and butter.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I need a frying pan.  Would you get one? Over there, under the range.

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: What put a wild hair up your ass?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I changed my mind.  That's all you need to know.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: That you, Talley?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: The one and only.  We got a little problem out here, Dennis.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You oughta try on the problem I got in here.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I need you to let me talk to Mr. Smith.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We been through that.  Forget it.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: We can't forget it.  The Sheriffs think you won't let me talk to Smith because he's dead.  They think you murdered him.

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: What in hell are you doing?!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: That's bullshit!  The guy's right here! He's alive!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: If you don't let me talk to him, they're going to attack the house.

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: You're gonna set him off, goddamnit! That's crazy!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: They better not!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Help me keep them out!  Let me speak to Smith, Dennis.  Let me speak to him right now.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: SHIT!!!!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Talk to me, Dennis.  Help me help you. Why can't you put Smith on the phone?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: He got knocked out.  It's like he's sleeping.  He just lays there.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Now I understand.  That helps.  I can make them understand that.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Let me come get him.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Fuck that!  You bastards will jump me!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: If you won't let me come in, then put him outside.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You'll cap my ass as soon as I step out the door!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You've already helped yourself once, Dennis; be smart again.  If you save his life, it'll help when you get to court.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Fuck you, Talley, fuck you!  You and one other guy, but that's it!  I want you stripped!  I gotta know you don't have guns!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Bring up the ambulance.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Okay, Dennis, we won't approach the house until you've closed the door.

Speaker: bigelow
Dialogue: He's got a concussion for sure.  I'm going to brace him.

Speaker: maddox
Dialogue: You ready to tell me what's going on?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: No.

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: Ain't gonna happen.  We've got unequal pupilation.  He could have an intracranial hematoma or a fracture or both.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Smith!  Wake up!

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: What are you doing?!  Stop that!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Wake up, goddamnit.  Who are you?

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: This man needs a hospital!  Stop it!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Use smelling salts, give him a shot, whatever.  I just need a minute.

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: I'm not going to wake him.  I don't even know that I can.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Just one question.  Please.

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: He.  Can't.  Answer.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I want you waiting in Smith's lap.  I want to know the second--and I mean the second--that he wakes up.

Speaker: anders' voice
Dialogue: It's me, Chief.  Can you talk?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What'd you find out?

Speaker: anders' voice
Dialogue: The cell phone is registered to a jewelry store in Beverly Hills.  The phone company shows no unusual --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Dead end--it's a clone.  What about the Mustang?

Speaker: anders' voice
Dialogue: It was stolen.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You get anything on Smith?

Speaker: anders' voice
Dialogue: Chief...it's like none of this exists. I'm sorry.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Keep trying.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I'll be safe when I'm outta here, you asshole!  I'm not talking any more!

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Was Smith talking?

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: I heard he's fucked up.  They're taking him to the hospital.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Goddamnit, tell me what you know.  Did the cops go in?  Did Smith have the disks?

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: I don't know.  Talley talked those punks into letting Smith out.  He's fucking us over, Glen.  That guy is fucking us over.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: What hospital?

Speaker: seymore
Dialogue: Canyon Country.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: I have another job for you.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Put him on.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Is my daddy okay?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: The doctors are taking care of him right now.  Thomas . . . are you safe?  Can you talk?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I think so.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I need your help with something.  But if you think those guys could catch you, then I don't want you to do it, okay?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Okay.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm serious, Thomas; I don't want you to get hurt.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: What do you want me to do?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Your dad has two computer disks.  They have funny names:  Marlon and Al.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: He has lots of disks.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I think he was working on them today, so they're probably in his office.  Could you find them and see who they belong to?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Dennis won't let me go to the desk.  He makes me sit on the floor.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I thought they locked you in your room.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I can get into the crawlspace from my closet and climb all over the house.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Can you get into the office?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I can get into the den.  The office is right across the hall.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: If I get Rooney into the back of the house, can you find the disks without being caught?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: I want to know what in hell you're doing.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm looking for you.  I need your tactical unit.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: I'm not stupid!  You can't get out of here fast enough, then you take back command; you agree to wait on Smith, then you risk everything in a stupid stunt to get him out --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Don't question me, Captain!  This is my crime scene!

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: -- then when you get him, you damn near assault the man in the ambulance!  What is going on?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm a negotiator, Captain.  I negotiate. That's all you need to know.  Now are you going to help me or not?

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Maddox!  Let's give the man a hand!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Keep the change, m'man.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: We're fucked.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: We're fucked until we think of a way out; then we're rich.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: There is no way out.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: For chrissake, please!  Help me celebrate!  I figured it out!

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Celebrate what?  Going to prison?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: No, dumbass--Talley.  Talley's the guy who keeps us in here, and Talley's the guy who can let us out.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Dennis.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: It's me, Chief.  I'm in the den.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Okay, bud, here we go.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Shit!  It's the cops!

Speaker: talley's voice
Dialogue: It's time to talk face-to-face, Dennis. Come out, just you, and we'll talk.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: What's he doing?  What's going on?!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Mars!  They're trying to blindside us! Check the front!

Speaker: dennis's voice
Dialogue: What's going on out front?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Come on, Dennis.  Talk to me.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You got a sniper out there, gonna shoot me?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Only if you try to grab me.  We could've shot you from the wall.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Would you be in a hurry to go to prison for the rest of your life?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'd be trying to get the best deal that I could.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Maybe that's what I'm doing.  Can I reach in my pocket, show you something?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You picked a bad house to hole up in, son.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Two hundred thousand cash, right in your pocket, no one needs to know.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Give up.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: There's a million dollars in there, maybe two million.  I'll give you half.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: The man you sent to the hospital is a criminal.  He has partners.  This is their house and their money and they want it back.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: It ain't been a good day, Chief.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Give up, Dennis.  Let these people go. At least you'll have your life.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I got'm!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Can you open them?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I opened Marlon.  I think it's somebody's taxes.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Look for names.  Does it say whose taxes they are?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I don't see any people names.  It's all businesses.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Try Al.  See if you can open Al.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Yeah!  Here's a name.  This is somebody's personal tax --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Who is it?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Charles G. Benza.  They're coming!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Sonny Benza.  Oh, fuck.

Speaker: metzger's voice
Dialogue: I'm at the hospital.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Put a guard on Smith!  I want you with Smith until I get there!

Speaker: jorgenson
Dialogue: What's going on?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Get in the car.  Now.

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: We're too late.  The police are here.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm posting a guard outside his room, but we'll need help from hospital security.

Speaker: reese
Dialogue: Is my staff in danger?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Not with my officers here, no, ma'am.

Speaker: metzger
Dialogue: Hey!  He's waking up!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Where am I?

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: Canyon Country Hospital.  Do you remember your name?

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Walter Smith.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: They're still in the house.

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: Chief Talley is the one who got you out.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I need to talk to him.  Alone.

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: I don't know what you're talking about.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: He's going to kill you.  Don't you know that?  He can't take the chance that you'll talk.

Speaker: klaus
Dialogue: That's enough.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Another minute.  Please --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Do you think I'm going to let you murder someone?!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'll go in that fuckin' house right now! I'll give those disks to the real FBI, you COCKSUCKINGMOTHERFUCKER!!  And I've got Smith!  I've got Smith!!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I guess we do.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Your phony FBI assholes.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What do you mean by that?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: I shouldn't have told him about the money.  Now Talley is gonna keep it for himself.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: He said that?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: If we don't escape, we gotta get the word out about the cash.  That's how we'll stay alive.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: What are you talking about?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: The only way he can keep the cash is if nobody knows about it.  He's gotta cap all three of us before they even read our rights.  He's probably planning it right now.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: That's crazy.  He's not going to kill us.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Kevin, you're so fuckin' stupid...

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: It's over.  We have to give up.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Fuck it's over.  That money's mine.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: That money's fucked up your brain. Talley's going to get tired of waiting for us to give up, and we'll all be fuckin' killed!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Then we might as well die rich.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: I'm not going to die for this!

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You're my fuckin' anchor, Kevin, the fuckin' lead around my life that I've been draggin' like a cripple leg!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I like it here, Dennis.  I'm never going to leave.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Fuckin' A.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What do you want?

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Keep your voice down.  I'm taking you and your brother out of here.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What happened?

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Do you want to go or not?  I'm offering you a way out of here.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I can't go without Thomas.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: All three of us will go, but we have to move fast.  Mars and Dennis don't know I'm doing this.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: How can we get out?

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Dennis and Mars are in the den.  I'll get your brother, then come back for you. We'll go down the stairs and out the front door, you understand?

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: Put on some shoes.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: You scared the shit out of me.  I was looking for you.  Dennis wants you to watch the monitors.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I heard you with the girl.

Speaker: kevin
Dialogue: It's over, Mars.  If we stay the cops will kill us.  Don't you get that?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I get it.  If you want to go, go.

Speaker: cooper
Dialogue: Come FBI guys showed up, Chief.  They said you were expecting them.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: They here now?

Speaker: cooper
Dialogue: You'll see'm up the street.

Speaker: the driver
Dialogue: You Talley?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Are all of you named Jones?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You used to be a cop.  All of you used to be cops.  I can tell by the way you move.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: How do you people expect this to work? The Sheriffs have a Crisis Response Team here.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Special Agent Jones.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What are you people going to do?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: What does he have on you?  I know why I'm doing this, but what does he have on you?

Speaker: dreyer
Dialogue: Krupchek lives in a shithole.

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: I guess we could jimmy it.

Speaker: dreyer
Dialogue: I don't want to pay for breaking it.

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: Christ, that stinks.

Speaker: dreyer
Dialogue: Mickey?  Look at this shit.

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: dreyer
Dialogue: He burned their noses.

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: Okay, this is creeping me out.

Speaker: dreyer
Dialogue: What are those, rats?

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: Ohmigod.  We gotta call Talley.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: This is bullshit.  I should've been notified.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Let it go, Captain.

Speaker: martin
Dialogue: Goddamned small town bullshit.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: It's mine.  Talley.

Speaker: mikkelson's voice
Dialogue: Chief, it's Mikkelson.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Go, Mickey.

Speaker: mikkelson
Dialogue: Chief, we just found Krupchek's trailer. We just went in there.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Mickey?  Call the state Homicide Bureau. Don't touch anything, just sit back and wait.

Speaker: mikkelson's voice
Dialogue: Yes, sir.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: We're getting those kids out of there.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Kev?  Key, Kevin, c'mon back.  I'm sorry I hit you.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: C'mon, Kev, don't fuckin' pout!  You're right.  It's time to call it a game.

Speaker: mars's voice
Dialogue: Kevin left.  He didn't want to be here anymore.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You mean he left, as in went out the front door?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I overheard him with the girl.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Shit!  That fuck!  Even when I want to turn myself in he screws it up!  Did he take the kids with him?

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: I don't know.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Jesus, get upstairs and find out!  If he took those kids, we're fucked!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Kevin left without you.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: I don't know what you're talking about.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Kevin's gone, your daddy's gone, everybody's gone.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: You're going to enjoy this.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Who's that?  Goddamnit, who's there?

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: Kevin, what the fuck?  Get up.

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: You're dead, you fuck.

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: What's wrong, Dennis?  Why're you so pissed off?

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Please...

Speaker: dennis
Dialogue: This fuck killed Kevin.  There's blood everywhere down there --

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: C'mon, Jen!  Run!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Keep going!

Speaker: mars
Dialogue: Everyone's gone.  We can do whatever we want.  We can do anything.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I'll shoot you!  I'm not kidding, you better stay away!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: No!  They have everything nailed!

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: He can't reach us in here.  We're safe.

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: I know.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What's he doing?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: We've got to get those kids out of there!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Those kids are in there with a fucking psychopath!  He kills people!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Talley.

Speaker: thomas's voice
Dialogue: Mars killed Kevin and Dennis!  We're in the security room.  He's burning the house --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You do what you have to do; I'm getting those kids.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: The kids are in here!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Help me, goddamnit, we can get the disks later!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Thomas!  Thomas, it's me!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Are the disks still in your room?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: No!  They're right here --

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Smith.

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Thank God!  Are you guys all right? You're not hurt?

Speaker: thomas
Dialogue: Our house is on fire!  We almost burned!

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: You guys step out for a second.  I have to talk to the Chief.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: Then you have everything.  You can put them away.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: A man has my family.  Gold watch here. Dark tan.

Speaker: walter
Dialogue: That would be Glen Howell.  He was on his way for the disks.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: How do I reach him?

Speaker: howell's voice
Dialogue: Hello?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Two words:  Glen Howell.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: How did you get this number?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Mr. Jones is dead.  So are two of his men.  The other three are in jail.  I have the disks.  I have Walter Smith. And you know what, you motherfucker?  I have you.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: I have your fucking family.  Don't forget that.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I also have a couple of million in cash. Call Sonny Benza.  Ask if I can keep it.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: What do you want?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: My wife and my daughter and the money. I'll bring the disks to the mall by the freeway, you bring my family.  We'll trade.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Fuck that!  You think I'm crazy?!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I think you got no choice.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Fuck the mall.  You know that motel on the road west of town?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Yeah.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: You got ten minutes.  If you're one minute late, we won't be here to find.

Speaker: beldone
Dialogue: The house is in flames, Benza's accountant is with the cops, and they're stacking the bodies like cordwood.

Speaker: castellano
Dialogue: Jesus Christ, it's a clusterfuck.

Speaker: beldone
Dialogue: You wanted to let Sonny handle it.  I would've moved in when we first found out.

Speaker: castellano
Dialogue: And by doing so, he would've known we have spies in his organization.

Speaker: beldone
Dialogue: Yes, sir.  But what about the disks?  If the cops end up with the disks, we're gonna see a whole lot of heat.

Speaker: castellano
Dialogue: I hate that Mickey Mouse bastard.  I hated his father, and I hate Sonny, too. Always with the tan.

Speaker: beldone
Dialogue: What do you want to do?

Speaker: castellano
Dialogue: Our people out there, they good people? People in the right place?

Speaker: beldone
Dialogue: The best.

Speaker: castellano
Dialogue: Sonny's a fuckup.  If he pulls this off, fine--life goes on.  But if the cops end up with those disks, we cut our losses.

Speaker: beldone
Dialogue: I understand.

Speaker: castellano
Dialogue: I want a message sent:  No fuckups allowed.

Speaker: beldone
Dialogue: I'll make the call.

Speaker: manelli's voice
Dialogue: You see anything?

Speaker: ruiz
Dialogue: Not yet.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Keep your eyes open.  He should've been here.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Police!

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Don't shoot!  Don't shoot him!

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Where's my family?!  Where's my family, you fuck?!

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Take it easy.  Just take it easy.  We're here to do business.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You said they would be here, goddamnit! Where are they?

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: They're close.  Let me make a call.  You can see they're okay.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You said they would be here!

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Put on the woman.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Jane?

Speaker: jane's voice
Dialogue: Jeff, we're --

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: You have the disks?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: You get the other one when I have my girls.  Not talk to them; have them.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Where is it?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Close.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: I have to see if it's real.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: First my girls.  I get my girls, you get the other disk.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Bring them.  Stop the car outside the room, but don't get out.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'll kill you!  You won't get the other disk!

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: If you shoot me, he'll kill your daughter.  Do you want to lose both of them?

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I love you.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: You'd better be kidding.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: I'm a cop, you asshole!  What did you expect me to do?  Pretend all this never happened?

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Are you out of your mind?

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: You fucked up, Glen.

Speaker: howell
Dialogue: Kill them.

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: No fuckups allowed.

Speaker: talley
Dialogue: Why...?

Speaker: marion
Dialogue: What good would it do to kill you?  The police already have the disk.

Speaker: benza
Dialogue: The fucking jet's waiting!  Would you get your shit out here?!

Speaker: a voice
Dialogue: No fuckups allowed.
